# traffic-open-data-worldwide
A summary of worldwide open source for traffic data (traffic volume, bike count, etc.)
(Last check was in May 2020)

### Summary
Overall, 
- Paris and Nantes have best data - complete (bike + veh), usable (not realtime API) and updated (after confinement) data. 
- Lille, Rennes and Bordeaux (not in our list)'s data is partially available.
- Montpellier, Stockholm, Amsterdam, and Grenoble's data is not very usable/available.

### French cities

##### Paris
- bike count
up-to-date, [link](https://parisdata.opendatasoft.com/explore/dataset/comptage-velo-donnees-compteurs/information/?disjunctive.id_compteur&disjunctive.nom_compteur&disjunctive.id&disjunctive.name&refine.date=2020)

- vehicle count
until 03/2020, [link](https://opendata.paris.fr/explore/dataset/comptages-routiers-permanents/export/?disjunctive.libelle&disjunctive.libelle_nd_amont&disjunctive.libelle_nd_aval&disjunctive.etat_trafic&refine.t_1h=2020&)

##### Lille (MEL Metropole)
- bike count
until 01/2020, [link](https://opendata.lillemetropole.fr/explore/dataset/comptages-velo/analyze/?refine.dateh=2020&%3D%3D)
- vehicle count
until 03/2020, [link](https://opendata.lillemetropole.fr/explore/dataset/comptages-voirie/export/?refine.date2=2020)

##### Renne
- bike
until 05/2020, [link](https://data.rennesmetropole.fr/explore/dataset/eco-counter-data/information/?refine.date=2020)
- vehicle
realtime, no historical data, [link](https://data.rennesmetropole.fr/explore/dataset/etat-du-trafic-en-temps-reel/table/?%3D%3D)

##### Montpellier
- bike count
until 2018, [link](https://data.montpellier3m.fr/dataset/comptage-velos)
- vehcile count
until 11/2019, [link](https://data.montpellier3m.fr/dataset/comptage-vehicules-particuliers-de-montpellier)

##### Nantes
- bike count 
until 05/2020, [link](https://data.nantesmetropole.fr/explore/dataset/244400404_comptages-velo-nantes-metropole/table/?disjunctive.boucle_num&disjunctive.libelle&disjunctive.jour_de_la_semaine&sort=jour)
- traffic saturation
until 05/2020, [link](https://data.nantesmetropole.fr/explore/dataset/244400404_fluidite-axes-routiers-nantes-metropole/table/)

##### Bordeaux (beyond list)
- traffic saturation
realtime, [link](https://opendata.bordeaux-metropole.fr/explore/dataset/ci_trafi_l/table/)

##### Toulouse, Lyon, Marseile, Nice (beyond list) don't have good data to use.

### European cities outside France

##### Stockholm
- bike count (not download-able)
the date is not clear on the site (2017/realtime), [link](https://dataportalen.stockholm.se/dataportalen/GetMetaDataById?id=LvFeature15489448)
- vehicle count  (not download-able)
the date is not clear on the site (2014-2015/realtime), [link](https://dataportalen.stockholm.se/dataportalen/GetMetaDataById?id=LvFeature9871252)

##### Amsterdam
- bike count
data not found
- vehicle count
realtime, no historical data, link
national wide data link
